page.title: 04BATH RUGBY FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: Bath R.F.C. was founded in 1865. The present team is probably the best ever.They have won the John Player Cup for the past two years.The first time, they beat Bristol 10-9,the second time they beat London Welsh 24-15.Bath has ten current England internationals.They have a large following of people from Bath and the West Country.Their average home gate is 4-5,000. 20,000 people are said to have supported them in the John Player Cup Final at Twickenham.The current good team has changed the image of Bath from being a tourist centre with a rugby team,into one of the rugby strongholds of Britain.The city is now known as a rugby centre the world over.
